meanings.definition: Anisoles: a class of chemical compounds containing a methoxy group attached to a benzene ring.
meanings.sent1: Anisoles are commonly used in the production of perfumes.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the properties of anisoles in laboratories.
meanings.sent3: The anisoles in the lab decided to throw a party to celebrate their unique structure.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like a bouquet of anisoles, adding a unique touch to her artwork.
meanings.sent5: The distinct smell of anisoles lingered in the air, leaving a lasting impression.
